formattedAddress: 15 Christopher St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 15 Christopher St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: What a great experience. I haven't had much experience at nicer salons like Maverick House, so I was kind of nervous, but Jenna was amazing! She talked through what I was looking for and what I was hoping to accomplish with my cut. She spent a lot of time educating me on my hair care moving forward, which I appreciate, as I'm still trying to understand what is best for my hair. And then the cut and style was awesome! An overall great experience. I'll definitely be going to her again.

originalText.text: Maverick House is a true West Village gem. Everything in this salon from the feel, to the stylists, to the hair services themselves are top of the line. Professionals in every sense of the word. Bobby and Anna saved my life. After getting haircuts from Anna, I look at myself in the mirror with 10x the confidence (and I have a lot of confidence to begin with). Would rate this place a 6/5 if I could.

text.text: Maverick House is a true West Village gem. Everything in this salon from the feel, to the stylists, to the hair services themselves are top of the line. Professionals in every sense of the word. Bobby and Anna saved my life. originalText.text:
I followed Jenna to Maverick House. The salon is beautiful and welcoming. Staff is great and the products are impeccable.
Jenna is the only person I trust with cutting, styling and coloring my hair. She is great at ensuring you get exactly what YOU want. It took me years to find a colorist that could actually do everything they promised, listened and achieved exactly what I wanted. She has great insight and knowledge- which is so helpful when I am unsure on what exactly I want. I love that I can walk in with an idea and that Jenna has the skills to make it happen. No more leaving a salon sad that I didn't get quite what I wanted. Thanks Maverick House and Jenna!

originalText.text: I was recommended Maverick House by 2 separate friends that have amazing hair.  I finally scheduled an appointment with Liz and could not be happier!  Liz took a look at my hair and needed very little guidance (but was open to as much as I wanted to provide) but knew exactly what to do.  I trusted her totally and it paid off, I got a great cut and color and my hair feels refreshed and super fitting.  I definitely will be going back and will make this cozy and cool salon my go-to.

text.text: I was recommended Maverick House by 2 separate friends that have amazing hair.  I finally scheduled an appointment with Liz and could not be happier!  Liz took a look at my hair and needed very little guidance (but was open to as much as I wanted to provide) but knew exactly what to do.  I trusted her totally and it paid off, I got a great cut and color and my hair feels refreshed and super fitting.  I definitely will be going back and will make this cozy and cool salon my go-to.

originalText.text: I have never felt more beautiful than I did after walking out of Maverick House. Jenna gives me THE best cuts I have ever had — beyond that, she is the colorist of everyone’s dreams. I walked in with the wild fantasy of being a Marilyn Monroe white-blonde and she got me there in one session. I have never been happier with my hair! + the vibes at Maverick House are top tier. So warm, so welcoming, such a gorgeous space to sit in for several hours. You will laugh and smile yourself silly and end up the most gorgeous you’ve ever been. 10/10.
